14 namespace YAML {
15 template<>
16 struct convert<geometry_msgs::Pose> {
17  static Node encode(const geometry_msgs::Pose& rhs) {
18  Node node;
19  node.push_back(rhs.position.x);
20  node.push_back(rhs.position.y);
21  node.push_back(rhs.position.z);
22  return node;
23  }
24 
25  static bool decode(const Node& node, geometry_msgs::Pose& rhs) {
26  if(!node.IsSequence() || node.size() != 3) {
27  return false;
28  }
29 
30  rhs.position.x = node[0].as<double>();
31  rhs.position.y = node[1].as<double>();
32  rhs.position.z = node[2].as<double>();
33  return true;
34  }
35 };
36 }

40 typedef std::shared_ptr<sensor_msgs::Range> scan_msg_ptr;

42 
43 cv::Point setGridPosition(geometry_msgs::Pose& sensor, nav_msgs::MapMetaData& mapInfo){
44  unsigned int grid_x = (unsigned int)((sensor.position.x - mapInfo.origin.position.x) / mapInfo.resolution);
45  unsigned int grid_y = (unsigned int)((-sensor.position.y - mapInfo.origin.position.y) / mapInfo.resolution);
46 
47  return cv::Point(grid_x, grid_y);
48 }
49 
50 void getPositionInfo(const std::string& base_frame, const std::string& target_frame, const tf::TransformListener& listener, geometry_msgs::Pose * position, std::vector<double> * rpy){
51  bool transformReady = false;
52  tf::StampedTransform stf;
53  tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> tmp;
54  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped tmp2;
55  tf::Quaternion q;
56 
57  try{
58  transformReady = listener.waitForTransform (base_frame, target_frame, ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(0.01));
59 
60  }
61  catch (tf::TransformException ex) {
62  ROS_ERROR("%s",ex.what());
63 
64  }
65 
66  if(transformReady) {
67  try{
68  listener.lookupTransform(base_frame, target_frame, ros::Time(0), stf);
69 
70  }
71  catch (tf::TransformException ex) {
72  ROS_ERROR("%s",ex.what());
73 
74  }
75  tmp = tf::Stamped<tf::Pose>(stf, stf.stamp_, base_frame);
76  tf::poseStampedTFToMsg(tmp,tmp2);
77  *position = tmp2.pose;
78 
79  try{
80  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(tmp2.pose.orientation, q);
81  tf::Matrix3x3(q).getRPY((*rpy)[0], (*rpy)[1], (*rpy)[2]);
82  }catch(std::exception ex) {
83  ROS_ERROR("%s", ex.what());
84  }
85 
86  }
87 }

89 void configCallback(pses_simulation::RangeSensorConfig& config, uint32_t level, rs::RangeSensor* sensor, pses_simulation::RangeSensorConfig* dynConfig)
90 {
91  sensor->setConfig(config);
92  *dynConfig = config;
93  ROS_DEBUG("Config was set");
94 }

109 void fetchLoopRate(ros::NodeHandle* nh, double& loopRate)
110 {
111  if (nh->hasParam("us_sim/loop_rate_laserscan"))
112  {
113  nh->getParam("us_sim/loop_rate_laserscan", loopRate);
114  }
115  else
116  {
117  loopRate = DEFAULT_LOOP_RATE;
118  }
119 }

232 using namespace usscan;
233 
234 int main(int argc, char **argv){
235 
236  ros::init(argc, argv, "simulation_usscan");
237  ros::NodeHandle nh;
238  double loopRate;
239  std::string usrTopic, usfTopic, uslTopic, mapLocation, mapMetadataLocation,
240  usrFrameID, usfFrameID, uslFrameID, mapFrameID;
241 
242  fetchLoopRate(&nh, loopRate);
243  fetchUSRTopic(&nh, usrTopic);
244  fetchUSFTopic(&nh, usfTopic);
245  fetchUSLTopic(&nh, uslTopic);
246  fetchMapLocation(&nh, mapLocation);
247  fetchMapMetadataLocation(&nh, mapMetadataLocation);
248  fetchUSRFrameID(&nh, usrFrameID);
249  fetchUSFFrameID(&nh, usfFrameID);
250  fetchUSLFrameID(&nh, uslFrameID);
251  fetchMapFrameID(&nh, mapFrameID);
252 
253  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<pses_simulation::RangeSensorConfig> server;
254  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<pses_simulation::RangeSensorConfig>::CallbackType f;
255  pses_simulation::RangeSensorConfig dynConfig;
256 
257  ros::Publisher front_us_range = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::Range>(usfTopic, 10);
258  ros::Publisher left_us_range = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::Range>(uslTopic, 10);
259  ros::Publisher right_us_range = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::Range>(usrTopic, 10);
260 
261  sensor_msgs::Range front_range, left_range, right_range;
262 
263  // get "god" map meta info
264  nav_msgs::MapMetaData mapInfo;
265  YAML::Node imgMetaInfo = YAML::LoadFile(mapMetadataLocation);
266  double resolution = imgMetaInfo["resolution"].as<double>();
267  geometry_msgs::Pose origin = imgMetaInfo["origin"].as<geometry_msgs::Pose>();
268  mapInfo.origin = origin;
269  mapInfo.resolution = resolution;
270 
271  // get "god" map
272  cv::Mat map = cv::imread(mapLocation,1);
273  cv::cvtColor(map, map, CV_RGB2GRAY);
274 
275  // create sensor object and link with config object
276  rs::RangeSensor rs_sonar(rs::us);
277  rs_sonar.setMap(map);
278  rs_sonar.setMapMetaData(mapInfo);
279 
280  f = boost::bind(&configCallback, _1, _2, &rs_sonar, &dynConfig);
281  server.setCallback(f);
282 
283  // variables needed for transformations
284  tf::TransformListener listener;
285  geometry_msgs::Pose position;
286  std::vector<double> rpy(3, 0.0);
287  cv::Point gridPose;
288 
289  ros::Time currentTime = ros::Time::now();
290 
291  front_range.header.frame_id = usfFrameID;
292  front_range.radiation_type = 0;
293 
294  left_range.header.frame_id = uslFrameID;
295  left_range.radiation_type = 0;
296 
297  right_range.header.frame_id = usrFrameID;
298  right_range.radiation_type = 0;
299 
300  // Loop starts here:
301  ros::Rate loop_rate(loopRate);
302  while(ros::ok()) {
303  currentTime = ros::Time::now();
304 
305  front_range.header.stamp = currentTime;
306  front_range.field_of_view = rs::degToRad(dynConfig.us_field_of_view);
307  front_range.min_range = dynConfig.us_min_sensor_distance;
308  front_range.max_range = dynConfig.us_max_sensor_distance;
309 
310  left_range.header.stamp = currentTime;
311  left_range.field_of_view = rs::degToRad(dynConfig.us_field_of_view);
312  left_range.min_range = dynConfig.us_min_sensor_distance;
313  left_range.max_range = dynConfig.us_max_sensor_distance;
314 
315  right_range.header.stamp = currentTime;
316  right_range.field_of_view = rs::degToRad(dynConfig.us_field_of_view);
317  right_range.min_range = dynConfig.us_min_sensor_distance;
318  right_range.max_range = dynConfig.us_max_sensor_distance;
319 
320  //front sensor
321  getPositionInfo(mapFrameID, usfFrameID, listener, &position, &rpy);
322  gridPose = setGridPosition(position, mapInfo);
323  front_range.range = rs_sonar.getUSScan(gridPose, rs::radToDeg(rpy[2]));
324 
325  //left sensor
326  getPositionInfo(mapFrameID, uslFrameID, listener, &position, &rpy);
327  gridPose = setGridPosition(position, mapInfo);
328  left_range.range = rs_sonar.getUSScan(gridPose, rs::radToDeg(rpy[2]));
329 
330  //right sensor
331  getPositionInfo(mapFrameID, usrFrameID, listener, &position, &rpy);
332  gridPose = setGridPosition(position, mapInfo);
333  right_range.range = rs_sonar.getUSScan(gridPose, rs::radToDeg(rpy[2]));
334 
335  //publish sensor msgs
336  front_us_range.publish(front_range);
337  right_us_range.publish(right_range);
338  left_us_range.publish(left_range);
339 
340  ros::spinOnce();
341  loop_rate.sleep();
342  }
343 
344  ros::spin();
345 }
